WorkItem.Description: It would be nice if we see simple sync application (even like console).

Comments.Message:
Hello,

Thank you for using our code sample request service. 

I'd like to confirm with you my understanding of the sample request:

You said that It's really so simple. I don't know which scenario you have encounted. So I could repaint it in my brain. could you please describute it more clearly in order to settle using information for us. I'm glad that you make time to post sample request for us.


Thanks
